person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| trade ministers |
| WTO (implicit) |
| Uruguay Round participants (implicit) |
| GATT (implicit) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| trade ministers |
| WTO |
| Uruguay Round participants |
| GATT |

Note: "implicit" entities are included if they can be clearly identified based on context. In this case, "WTO" and "Uruguay Round participants" are implicitly referring to the persons or entities that are part of or involved with these organizations. Similarly, "GATT" refers to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, which is an international treaty and thus can be considered a person or entity in a metaphorical sense.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| ministerial meeting |
| WTO |
| Uruguay Round |
| under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

| Location |
| --- |
| ministerial meeting (at the WTO) |
| Uruguay Round |
| General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) |

Note: "WTO" is included as a location since it is the setting for the ministerial meeting.
